body.name: Marvel Avengers Titan Hero Series Doctor Strange in The Multiverse of Madness Toys, Doctor Strange The Scarlet Witch 12-Inch-Scale 2-Pack
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 23 hrs 24 mins
features: DOCTOR STRANGE AND THE SCARLET WITCH: With the help of the Scarlet Witch, Doctor Strange must fight to protect reality from a sinister magical villain

12-INCH-SCALE ACTION FIGURES: Inspired by Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness, part of the Marvel Cinematic Universe, this large-scale action figure 2-pack offers kids ages 4 and up twice the magical action and adventure
ENTERTAINMENT-INSPIRED DESIGN: Boys and girls can imagine spell-blasting battles with these Doctor Strange and the Scarlet Witch toys, featuring entertainment-inspired design and detail
POSEABLE ACTION FIGURES: 12-inch-scale Marvel Avengers Titan Hero Series action figures feature multiple points of articulation, so kids can pose them for superpowered adventures they imagine
LOOK FOR OTHER MARVEL TITAN HERO FIGURES: Be on the lookout for other Avengers Titan Hero Series figures, inspired by the Marvel Universe (Each sold separately. Subject to availability.)
body.description: With the help of the Scarlet Witch, Doctor Strange must fight to protect reality from a sinister magical villain! Conjure the excitement of the Marvel Universe with the Titan Hero Series Doctor Strange and the Scarlet Witch action figure 2-pack! Kids ages 4 and up can imagine blasting into a universe of superpowered sorcery with this 12-inch-scale Marvel action figure set, inspired by Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness, part of the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Featuring movie-inspired design and detail, as well as multiple points of articulation for poseable fun, boys and girls will love pretending to battle with the Mystic Arts with these large-scale Doctor Strange and the Scarlet Witch toys! Copyright 2022 MARVEL. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The face on both dolls look very similar to the actual characters. After receiving an opening my package I watched the movie again just to compare the toy to the characters. Fantastic for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grandson loves Superheros
reviews.reviewText: My grandson loves superheros and he had all the standard ones. Being able to find Dr. Strange was a bonus for him. Basically the item is a standard plastic action figure, but the thing that makes it stand out is you just don't find Dr. Strange everywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2022
reviews.reviewText: My grandson has one to play with home and one for his collection at my house. We're looking for 12" Dr. Strange Vision Falcon and all the Guardians of the Galaxy action figures for decent prices. They are giftable and durable as long as you don't play too rough with them. As far as value for the money no bcuz toys break. The Marvels Action Figures are for children so they shouldn't be so expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I started buying these 12” action figures for my grandson. They are great quality, nicely made, look great and best of all he loves all that I have bought! Will continue buying them for him. Not overly priced and boys need toys to use their imagination!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2 of these for Christmas presents. Both for family members that are serious Avenger fans. Came in a 2 pack for a great price and got them both on a great discount! Seriously 1 of the best gifts out of any and again I bought 2 for 2 different family members! By the single they are either hard to find or way too expensive and not the 12' inch action figures. Great purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My newphew loved his gift. Will not let it go

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I paid $45 for these and the paint on scarlet witch is horrible, mismatched skin colour blotches as well as random marks all over them. They have scuff marks that makes them look used. I’m So disappointed in the quality for the price. Not going to the hassle of returning them but I definitely do not recommend buying from this shop.
ESTAN BASNTANTE BIEN LAS FIGURAS, MI HIJO ESTA SUPER CONTENTO YA QUE, SON RESISTENTES Y DE BUENA CALIDAD , ESTOY BASTANTE SATISFECHO CON MI COMPRA.
Good set, decent price for the two of them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect, figures even look like the actors.
envoi et emballage parfait .figurines au top très contente de mon achat ,je recommande cette article
